home.desc: LitLog is an app designed to help you organize and keep track of your reading journey.

registerBook.title: Register Books
registerBook.desc: Register books you'd like to read. You can also search for books via the search form (from Google Books API).

manageStatus.title: Manage Reading Status
manageStatus.desc: Set your reading status to 'Unread', 'Reading', or 'Finished'.

addNotes.title: Add Notes
addNotes.desc: Record thoughts and insights as threads for each book.

review.title: Review
review.desc: Review your past reading records to discover new insights.
